Santa Claus:
So, be careful: ordinary squashes, which can be split with ordinary weapons, mainly drop consumables, and much less often valuable rewards.
To get a truly valuable item, team up with colleagues and try splitting Snowy Large Squash with a souvenir weapon!
One last thing: when splitting snow squashes, you will receive from one to several awards. However, there is a possibility that the squash will be empty. This applies to all types of squashes.
